turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hey, I'm looking for some new games to play. I'm really in the mood for a good RPG.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay! I can help with that. Do you have any preferences within the RPG genre? For example, do you prefer fantasy, sci-fi, or something else? Any particular gameplay styles you enjoy (turn-based, action, etc.)?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, good question. I guess I like fantasy, and definitely action RPGs. Turn-based combat just isn't my thing. I loved Elden Ring, something similar to that would be great.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Alright, based on your preference for action RPGs with a fantasy setting similar to Elden Ring, I would recommend checking out "Monster Hunter: World". It has great exploration and combat.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, I've already played Monster Hunter. Anything a little less... mainstream? I'm looking for something maybe a bit more indie, or at least not a AAA title everyone knows.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, let me refine the search. How about "Grim Dawn"? It's an action RPG with a darker fantasy setting, known for its deep character customization and loot system. It's pretty popular within ARPG fans but might not be as widely known.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: That sounds promising! One last, maybe difficult, question: Can you recommend something similar to Grim Dawn, but with a crafting system as complex as Path of Exile? That's what I'm really after, but I'm burned out on PoE.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: That is a tough one! A game with the exact combination of Grim Dawn's gameplay and Path of Exile's crafting is rare. One title that *might* scratch that itch is "Last Epoch." It's still in active development, but it has a crafting system that's getting increasingly complex and character building that's similar to Grim Dawn. But, it's still early access, so be warned.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, Last Epoch sounds like exactly what I'm looking for! I'll check it out, thanks so much for the suggestions!
